name: Learn the numbers! With Patty the ducky
name_original: Learn the numbers! With Patty the ducky
description:
Learn the numbers! is a game made for a university project.

Our objective with the game is to introduce children to the numbers from 1 to 9 and simple operations (addition and subtraction). Available in english and spanish.

---

¡Aprende los números! es un juego hecho para un proyecto universitario.

Nuestro objetivo con el juego es de introducir niños a los números del 1 al 9 y operaciones simples (sumas y restas). Disponible en español e ingles.

---

Aditional thanks to Juan Camilo Dominguez for his sprite work:

https://www.artstation.com/jcamilod
